name: Sudoku Starry Sky
description:
Sudoku Starry Sky- Pretty puzzling. An innovative Sudoku game.
Highlighted features:
- Each puzzle is original,which is set by professional sudoku players.
- Innovative look and feel
- 1500+ beautiful puzzles

More features:
- 5 difficulty levels
- Top times
- Daily Chanllege
- Optional aids
- Undo
- Digit hightlighting
- Count of remaining digits

What to wait for:
- More Sudoku variants subjects

Enjoy.
